pages.title: Kamen Rider Blood
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build: Be The One (2018, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:build/devices/build_driver#build_driver_blood)Build Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed III$(li)Resistance II$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste II$(li)Jump Boost II$(li)Strength IV$(li)Flying
